definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Use Flower Time Multiple-Purpose Eye Protection Package in beauty parlor professional nursing.
sentences.chinese: 美容院专业护理使用花样年华多效护眼套装。

sentences.english: A college boy died suddenly at the playground.
sentences.chinese: 花样年华的大学男生猝死在操场。

sentences.english: Ellen Kelly, budding with womanhood and childfresh happiness.
sentences.chinese: 埃伦凯利，处于女子花样年华，又带着孩子般的喜悦。

sentences.english: His work In the Mood for Love is on the peak of his director career.
sentences.chinese: 他所拍的《花样年华》达到了其导演生涯的最顶峰。
